assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course includes the following topics: Estonian folklore and ealier school literature; Estonian children's literature and the development of critical thought; Estonian children's poetry, modern children's literature.
description.et: Õppeaine hõlmab järgmisi teemasid: eesti lasteluule, eesti folkloor, eesti lasteproosa klassika, uuem eesti lasteproosa, eesti lastenäidend, lastejakirjad ja lastekirjanduse kriitika.

objectives.en: To provide knowledge of the history, theory and classics of Estonian children's literature necessary for teaching at primary school. To foster students' understanding of a child's emotinal world with the help of children's literature.
objectives.et: Üldeesmärgiks on anda ülevaade eesti lastekirjanduse ajaloost, teooriast ja lastekirjanduse klassikast kindlustamaks lastekirjanduse tundmine  põhikooli I ja II  astme õppeainete õpetamiseks ja lapse tundemaailma ning käitumise mõistmiseks kirjanduskogemuse varal.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course a student will have basic knowledge of Estonian literature and the theory of children's literature; analyses literary works and is able to espress the results, is able to connect literature with real life contexts; can apply acquired knowledge in teaching different subjects and extra-curricular activities.
